identity.name: REALUM
identity.aesthetic: Cyberpunk 2077 meets DeFi Dashboard. Neon accents on deep void backgrounds. Glitch effects. Terminal aesthetics.
identity.audience: Gen Z, Gamers, Crypto Natives, Students (14-35)

usage_rules.primary: Use for Main CTAs, Active States, and Key Data Highlights.
usage_rules.secondary: Use for Alerts, 'Delete' actions, and Negative trends.
usage_rules.accent: Use sparingly for 'New' badges or special achievements.
usage_rules.background: NEVER use pure black (#000000). Use #050505 or #0A0A0A.

grid_system.marketing: The Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetrical, overlapping, chaotic but balanced.
grid_system.dashboard: The Bento Grid (Mode B). Dense, 100% height utilization, no gaps.

containers.card_style: Sharp edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm). 1px border with 'neon-glow' effect on hover.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-black uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-primary/80 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.5)] transition-all duration-300 clip-path-angled
buttons.secondary: border border-primary/50 text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 uppercase tracking-widest

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/20 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-none font-mono text-sm

cards.base: bg-card border border-border relative overflow-hidden group

navigation.style: Fixed top, glassmorphism, 1px bottom border (border-white/10). Logo left, Links right (mono font).

motion.loading: Terminal typing effect or ASCII spinner

media.image_style: High contrast, desaturated with neon color grading. Apply 'mix-blend-mode: luminosity' if image is too colorful, then overlay a gradient.

libraries.charts: Recharts (customized with neon strokes and dark tooltips)
libraries.maps: React Map GL (Dark Mode custom style) or simple SVG interactive map for MVP
libraries.3d: React Three Fiber (for Hero Coin only)
libraries.icons: Lucide React (default), Phosphor Icons (for bold weight)

anti_patterns: NO gradients on text unless it's a very subtle shine.
NO rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp (rounded-sm or rounded-none).
NO center alignment for main content. Use asymmetry.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure neon text is readable against black. Use text-shadow if needed.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable glitch effects if prefers-reduced-motion is true.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP THEME: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors provided in 'colors.palette'.
3. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'CyberpunkLayout' component that includes the noise texture and scanlines overlay.
4. BUILD COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners and add neon border effects.
5. IMPLEMENT PAGES: Follow the 'Tetris Grid' for Landing and 'Bento Grid' for Dashboard.
6. USE IMAGES: Use the provided image_urls for placeholders. Do not leave empty images.
